price: To Allah they ascribe daughters[33] – glory be to Him – but for themselves they choose what they desire [i.e., sons].
arabic: وَيَجۡعَلُونَ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡبَنَٰتِ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَلَهُم مَّا يَشۡتَهُونَ
footnotes: [33] The pagans falsely claimed that the angels were Allah’s daughters.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
